questions.question: 1. In GenBank format, the sequence starts with:

answers.c: A line containing greater than symbol (>)

questions.question: 2. If the plaque assay serial dilution factor is too low:

answers.a: There will be too few bacteria cells lysed to accurately count
answers.b: The plaques will fuse, lysing the entire culture
answers.d: None of the bacteria will be lysed

questions.question: 3. A plaque assay detects the number of __________
4. Forty-eight (48) plaques were counted in a plate when 0.1 ml of bacteriophage-infected bacteria from 10¯⁶ dilution (10 ml culture) was plated. The original bacteriophage density was:
